channel.title: PAR:EL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PAR:EL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ray-Ban Maker EssilorLuxottica Sales Top Estimates
item.description: EssilorLuxottica SA posted better-than-expected revenue in the second quarter, though profit at the world’s biggest eyewear maker was held back by tariffs and its investments in smart glasses.
